description:
Welcome to the early 90's!

Marquees are like mopeds - everyone wants one & you don't want your friends to see you with it.

Well, I'm rocking my childhood again, so come on and join me. I packed a ton of options into this and used all the latest code to make these smooth and fun.

You can choose your own background and font colors, text size, scroll mode (scroll, alternate or slide), portrait or landscape, left or right direction and you can bold and italicize the text! You can also add images via url tags.

Add as many images or text as you like! Have fun playing with the layout and remember, the text box to enter the marquee accepts html, so knock yourself out!

Plus, rocking a marquee can actually be useful. How, you ask?

- Shout across the bar

- Send a message to someone you can see but aren't close to

- Pass a message in a meeting

- Generally make you look cool and up your social status

Need I say more?!

More images are available via the Find Images button when creating a marquee. 

Have fun and play safe! Remember, - road rage may seem like a good idea, but it's usually best when they can't hear what you're saying.
